head.title: Email Hosting Services | Pick Up Your Email | mail2web.com

meta.name: description
meta.content: Check your email from anywhere in the world. mail2web.com offers email hosting services for all your email needs. Check your email for free.

div.style: width:960px; height:15px; text-align:right; margin:0 auto; margin-bottom:5px;
width:650px; margin-left: auto ; margin-right: auto; text-align:left

div.div: From any computer, anywhere in the world. No need to register!

td.a:
Huge deals on Business Email
powered by Microsoft Exchange!

div.span: Receive real-time push email on your smart phone.
Live operator assisted activation. Start a 60-day FREE trial now!
Anywhere access to email, contacts, calendars, tasks & files

FREE 30-day trial
for the first 2 accounts!
Start a blog, web album, or store your files online!

FREE domain name registration
when you sign up for a
website hosting plan!

div.div:
Webmail
Check your POP/IMAP email on the web. Your info is private and no registration is required. Learn more about mail2web Webmail.

Mobile Email
Push email, calendars & contacts to your mobile phone! Sync iPhone, Android, BlackBerry & more. Learn more about Mobile Email.

Business Email
With Hosted Exchange Email from myhosting.com, get an outsourced account on your domain & brand. Learn more about Hosted Exchange.

Web Hosting
Start a blog, forum, gallery, online store & more. All the tools you need are at myhosting.com. Learn more about Web Hosting.

mail2web Deals
Huge deals on the latest online services including VoIP, Credit Card Monitoring, Online Dating and much more! Get huge savings now!
